original_text: Sergius Paulus saw what had happened to Elymas. He was very surprised about the things that Barnabas and Paul taught him about the Lord Jesus. And so he believed in Jesus.
korean_text: 이에 총독이 그렇게 된 것을 보고 믿으며 주의 가르치심을 놀랍게 여기니라

sentences.original_text: Sergius Paulus saw what had happened to Elymas
sentences.korean_translation: 세르기오 바울루스는 엘리마에게 일어난 일을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: about the things that Barnabas and Paul taught him
sentences.korean_translation: 바나바와 바울이 그에게 가르친 것들에 대하여

sentences.original_text: And so he believed in Jesus
